secret_template.description: Template to generate an opaque secret
secret_template.body:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: ${name: secretName}
data:
  ${key: secretKey}: ${value: BASE64_ENCODED_VALUE}
type: Opaque
